params.taskDescription:
Determine <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mover>
      <mrow>
        <mi>A</mi>
        <mi>B</mi>
      </mrow>
      <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
    </mover>
  </mrow>
  <mo>∪<!-- ∪ --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mover>
      <mrow>
        <mi>B</mi>
        <mi>D</mi>
      </mrow>
      <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
    </mover>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\overline {AB}}  \cup {\overline {BD}}</annotation></semantics></math>.
params.detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mover>
      <mrow>
        <mi>A</mi>
        <mi>B</mi>
      </mrow>
      <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
    </mover>
  </mrow>
  <mo>∪<!-- ∪ --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mover>
      <mrow>
        <mi>B</mi>
        <mi>D</mi>
      </mrow>
      <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
    </mover>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mover>
    <mrow>
      <mi>A</mi>
      <mi>D</mi>
    </mrow>
    <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
  </mover>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\overline {AB}}  \cup {\overline {BD}}  = \overline {AD} </annotation></semantics></math>. The union of line segment <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mover>
    <mrow>
      <mi>A</mi>
      <mi>B</mi>
    </mrow>
    <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
  </mover>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\overline {AB} </annotation></semantics></math> and the line segment <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mover>
      <mrow>
        <mi>B</mi>
        <mi>D</mi>
      </mrow>
      <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
    </mover>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\overline {BD}}</annotation></semantics></math> contains all points in each line segment combined.

params.detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mover>
    <mrow>
      <mi>B</mi>
      <mi>D</mi>
    </mrow>
    <mo>→<!-- → --></mo>
  </mover>
  <mo>∩<!-- ∩ --></mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mover>
      <mrow>
        <mi>B</mi>
        <mi>C</mi>
      </mrow>
      <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
    </mover>
  </mrow>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mover>
      <mrow>
        <mi>B</mi>
        <mi>C</mi>
      </mrow>
      <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
    </mover>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\overrightarrow {BD}  \cap {\overline {BC}}  = {\overline {BC}} </annotation></semantics></math>. The intersection of the ray <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mover>
    <mrow>
      <mi>B</mi>
      <mi>D</mi>
    </mrow>
    <mo>→<!-- → --></mo>
  </mover>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\overrightarrow {BD} </annotation></semantics></math> and the line segment <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mover>
      <mrow>
        <mi>B</mi>
        <mi>C</mi>
      </mrow>
      <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
    </mover>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\overline {BC}} </annotation></semantics></math> contains only the points common to each set, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mrow class="MJX-TeXAtom-ORD">
    <mover>
      <mrow>
        <mi>B</mi>
        <mi>C</mi>
      </mrow>
      <mo accent="false">¯<!-- ¯ --></mo>
    </mover>
  </mrow>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">{\overline {BC}} </annotation></semantics></math>.

params.detailedSolution:
<math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mover>
    <mrow>
      <mi>B</mi>
      <mi>A</mi>
    </mrow>
    <mo>→<!-- → --></mo>
  </mover>
  <mo>∪<!-- ∪ --></mo>
  <mover>
    <mrow>
      <mi>B</mi>
      <mi>D</mi>
    </mrow>
    <mo>→<!-- → --></mo>
  </mover>
  <mo>=</mo>
  <mover>
    <mrow>
      <mi>A</mi>
      <mi>D</mi>
    </mrow>
    <mo>↔<!-- ↔ --></mo>
  </mover>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">\overrightarrow {BA}  \cup \overrightarrow {BD}  = \overleftrightarrow {AD}</annotation></semantics></math>. The union of the ray starting at point <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>B</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">B</annotation></semantics></math> and extending infinitely in the direction of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A</annotation></semantics></math> and the ray starting at point <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>B</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">B</annotation></semantics></math> and extending infinitely in the direction of <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>D</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">D</annotation></semantics></math> is the straight line extending infinitely in both directions containing points <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>A</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">A</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>B</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">B</annotation></semantics></math>, <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>C</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">C</annotation></semantics></math>, and <math xmlns="http://www.w3.org/1998/Math/MathML"><semantics><mrow>
  <mi>D</mi>
</mrow><annotation encoding="LaTeX">D</annotation></semantics></math>.
